metadata.synopsis: New York City corporate head Max Herschel (Alan King) maintains a miserable marriage and several ongoing affairs, the most serious of which involves ambitious TV producer Bones Burton (Ali MacGraw). However, the outspoken Bones is tired of being the woman on the side, and when Max refuses to take her more seriously, she dumps him for young writer Steven Routledge (Peter Weller). But Max is a man who's used to getting just what he wants, and he doesn't take rejection lying down.

reviews: It raises questions about what makes people tick and then doesn't answer them.
Silly rom-com, that dishes out its comedy in an aggressive NYC style.
